alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Ector; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ector, southeastern Andrews and northwestern Midland Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 821 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Odessa, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Odessa, Midland International Air and Space Port, West Odessa, Warfield and Odessa Schlemeyer Field. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 118 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
